safedata 0.1
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Using the safe_data package

Reference

All functions

addData()

Add data worksheets to a safedata object

addLocations()

Add location information to a safedata object

addTaxa()

Add taxonomic observations to a safedata object

addTaxonHeirarchies()

Add complete taxonomic heirarchies to a safedata object

apiSearch()

Run an API call using the constructed api URL.

buildFilePathFromVersions()

Builds a list of file paths to SAFE datasets in the versions list

buildVersionsDataframe()

Build a "versions" dataframe of a SAFE concept ID

checkApiCall()

Check a SAFE search API call for errors.

checkRecordDownloaded()

Check if the record (file) at the specified path has been downloaded

createSafe()

Initiate a new safedata object

downloadSafe()

Download SAFE project data file associated with the supplied record

getNameBackbone()

Return taxonomic heirarchy for a SAFE taxonomic entry

getRecordIdFromDoi()

Extracts record ID from Zenodo DOI link

getSafe()

Get the SAFE files with the specified IDs

getSafeDataClassType()

Get the R data type from the SAFE field_type variable

getTaxonWrapper()

Extract taxonomic heirarchy from the GBIF database for the given taxa

importSafe()

Import a SAFE data file

isSafeRecord()

Checks whether the supplied zenodo record is from the SAFE community

isSafeTypeCategorical()

Check if the SAFE data type is of R type categorical/factor

nameBackboneToDf()

Convert RGBIF name_backbone list to dataframe

print(<safedata>)

Print summary of information for a safedata object to the console

printVersions()

Returns print-friendly table displaying versions information for a given SAFE concept ID

processSafe()

Get record info for specified SAFE project ID from the Zenodo database

processSafeSummary()

Process summary 'meta' information for SAFE project data

readTransposedXlsx()

Read a transposed .xlsx file into a dataframe

searchAuthor()

Search SAFE projects by author name.

searchDates()

Search SAFE projects by date.

searchFields()

Search SAFE projects by data field information.

searchSpatial()

Search SAFE projects by spatial sampling area/named location.

searchTaxa()

Search SAFE projects by taxa.

searchText()

Search SAFE projects by free text search.

setSafeDir()

Set the local SAFE data directory

simpleCap()

Capitalize the first letter of each word in a string

updateIndex()

Update the SAFE index file

zenodoRecordApiLookup()

Return information of the given id using the Zenodo record API

zenodoVersionsApiLookup()

Perform a lookup on the Zenodo database with an API to access information for all versions of the specified id.

Contents

  • All functions

Developed by Andy Aldersley, David Orme.
